frontmatter.title: Value.Composition
frontmatter.description: `Value.Composition` combines two or more `Value.*` components into one.

frontmatter.title: Value.String
frontmatter.description: `Value.String` is a base component for displaying values of the type `string`.

frontmatter.title: Value.SummaryList
frontmatter.description: `Value.SummaryList` uses definition lists to semantically make content consumable for screen readers.

frontmatter.title: Value.Number
frontmatter.description: `Value.Number` is a base component for displaying values of the type `number`.

frontmatter.title: Value.Boolean
frontmatter.description: `Value.Boolean` is a base component for displaying values of the type `boolean`.

frontmatter.title: Value.ArraySelection
frontmatter.description: `Value.ArraySelection` is a wrapper component for displaying string values, with user experience tailored for an array of selected values.

frontmatter.title: Value.Provider
frontmatter.description: The `Value.Provider` lets you pass generic properties to all nested Value.* components.

frontmatter.title: Value.Selection
frontmatter.description: `Value.Selection` is a component for displaying a string value based on a user selection.
